languages.text: "Однажды пережив предательство, сложно вновь доверять кому-то. Особенно самым верным и приближенным".
"Once betrayed, it is hard to put one's trust in others again. Especially those closest and most loyal to us."
languages.original_text: "Однажды пережив предательство, сложно вновь доверять кому-то. Особенно самым верным и приближенным".

traits.locale_text: "Once betrayed, it's hard to put one's trust in others again. Especially into those most close and loyal."
"Once betrayed, it's hard to put one's trust in others again. Especially into those most close and loyal."
"Once betrayed, it is hard to put one's trust in others again. Especially those closest and most loyal to us."
"Once betrayed, it is hard to put one's trust in others again. Especially those closest and most loyal to us."
"Once betrayed, it is hard to put one's trust in others again. Especially those closest and most loyal to us."

languages.text: “只要遭到过一次背叛，我们就再也不可能付出全心全意的信任，尤其是对那些曾经最亲密的人。”
languages.original_text: "Once betrayed, it is hard to put one's trust in others again. Especially those closest and most loyal to us."

traits.locale_text: “只要遭到过一次背叛，我们就再也不可能付出全心全意的信任，尤其是对那些曾经最亲密的人。”

languages.text: «Una vez que te traicionan, cuesta mucho volver a depositar tu confianza en los demás. Sobre todo en los más cercanos y leales».
languages.original_text: "Once betrayed, it is hard to put one's trust in others again. Especially those closest and most loyal to us."

traits.locale_text: «Una vez que te traicionan, cuesta mucho volver a depositar tu confianza en los demás. Sobre todo en los más cercanos y leales».

languages.text: « Il est difficile d'accorder sa confiance de nouveau après une trahison, surtout quand elle a été commise par une personne proche et loyale. »
languages.original_text: "Once betrayed, it is hard to put one's trust in others again. Especially those closest and most loyal to us."

traits.locale_text: « Il est difficile d'accorder sa confiance de nouveau après une trahison, surtout quand elle a été commise par une personne proche et loyale. »

languages.text: "Einmal hintergangen, ist es schwer, anderen wieder zu vertrauen. Vor allem denen, die uns am nächsten stehen und uns treu ergeben sind."
languages.original_text: "Once betrayed, it is hard to put one's trust in others again. Especially those closest and most loyal to us."

traits.locale_text: "Einmal hintergangen, ist es schwer, anderen wieder zu vertrauen. Vor allem denen, die uns am nächsten stehen und uns treu ergeben sind."

languages.text: 「一度裏切られると、再び他人を信頼することは難しい。我らに最も身近で、忠誠を誓っている者であれば尚更だ」
languages.original_text: "Once betrayed, it is hard to put one's trust in others again. Especially those closest and most loyal to us."

traits.locale_text: 「一度裏切られると、再び他人を信頼することは難しい。我らに最も身近で、忠誠を誓っている者であれば尚更だ」

languages.text: "Bir kez kazık yediğinde diğerlerine yeniden güvenmek zordur. Özellikle de bize en yakın ve sadık olanlara."
languages.original_text: "Once betrayed, it is hard to put one's trust in others again. Especially those closest and most loyal to us."

traits.locale_text: "Bir kez kazık yediğinde diğerlerine yeniden güvenmek zordur. Özellikle de bize en yakın ve sadık olanlara."
